name: The Dark Entity
description:
This is a short horror game set in a maze.

Your objective is to collect the orbs scattered around the maze in order to escape.

It knows where you are, you can run but it will always find you...

**This is a game made by me,  a 15 year old boy who wants to be a game dev.

This is the first game i made and published online. I will be posting the first gameplay video i see of my game as a trailer video. Just make a video about it on youtube if you want and leave the link in the comments or in the discussion board.

Sorry if that seems like im begging for attention, i just want as much feedback as i can get!

I will try and fix any bug or problem people encounter, if you find one post about it on the discussion board.

Enjoy the game!

Good Luck!**

I was unable to test the Mac OS version of the game so if it does not run properly leave a comment/post on the discussion board and i will get it fixed in 1-2 days max

WASD  - Move

Mouse - Look

F - Flashlight

SHIFT - Sprint

TAB - Show Cursor
